lead_paragraph: Mafaaz earned an automatic berth into the Kentucky Derby by winning the $115,000 Kentucky Derby Challenge Stakes at Kempton Park in England on Wednesday. Mafaaz, a chestnut colt, defeated 13 rivals to gain one of the 20 spots for the Derby on May 2. Mafaaz, making his third career start and first in 2009, was ridden by Richard Hills and trained in England by John Gosden, who had two Breeders’ Cup triumphs and also spent 11 years at Santa Anita. mafaaz.
